page.title: 08TRANSPORT - COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Stockton on Forest is 4 miles from York. There is a bus route through Stockton to Scarborough. Buses stop 4 times a day.The fare to York is 70p for Adults 35p for children. There are no rivers near Stockton only a few becks which are not very wide. The nearest river is the Derwent at Stamford Bridge. There was a railway here until 1962 but it was closed down because not enough people used it.It went from York to Hull. The main road from York to Scar- borough cuts through our block (A64). There is a very large roundabout on it and work has recently started to extend the York by pass from it.
